title: A Hate Crime Narrative Takes Hold Around a Tragedy in Texas
description:
The quick rush to judgment after migrants were killed in Brownsville ignored details about history and life in the border town.

The post A Hate Crime Narrative Takes Hold Around a Tragedy in Texas appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Around the World Update: Turkey, Pakistan, and Palestine
description:
Ryan Grim and guests discuss Turkey’s upcoming election, Imran Khan’s arrest in Pakistan, and recent Gaza airstrikes.
